mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.name, p.price, CASE WHEN d.discount_id IS NOT NULL THEN p.price * (100 - d.rate) / 100 ELSE p.price END AS final_price, p.image, c.category_name, p.count, p.sold_count, p.description, d.rate, d.type FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN category c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN discount d ON p.product_id = d.product_id AND d.is_active = 1 AND NOW() BETWEEN d.start_date AND d.end_date ORDER BY p.product_id

SELECT p.product_id, p.name, p.price, p.price * (100 - d.rate) / 100 AS final_price, p.image, c.category_name, p.sold_count, d.rate, d.type FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN category c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id JOIN discount d ON p.product_id = d.product_id WHERE d.is_active = 1 AND d.type = 'DISCOUNT' AND NOW() BETWEEN d.start_date AND d.end_date

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, price, image, count, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{image}, #{stock}, #{description})
INSERT INTO product_category (product_id, category_id) SELECT #{productId}, c.category_id FROM category c WHERE c.category_name = #{category}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.name, p.price, CASE WHEN d.discount_id IS NOT NULL THEN p.price * (100 - d.rate) / 100 ELSE p.price END AS final_price, p.image, c.category_name, p.count, p.sold_count, p.description, d.rate, d.type FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN category c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN discount d ON p.product_id = d.product_id AND d.is_active = 1 AND NOW() BETWEEN d.start_date AND d.end_date ORDER BY p.sold_count DESC, p.product_id LIMIT #{limit}
